Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Provides that the public service commission require certain utilities to repair and restore to its original condition any roadway of this state that it disturbs or destroys
Summary: Provides that the public service commission require any utility subject to the provisions of the public service law to repair and restore to its original condition any roadway of this state that it disturbs or destroys while maintaining its respective service.
LawCode: Amd ยง5, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to requiring utilities to repair certain roadways
